subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Cyclones overwhelmed North Carolina Central but will be without Georges Niang, who led Iowa State with 24 points, for the rest of the tournament after he broke his foot.
snippet: The Cyclones overwhelmed North Carolina Central but will be without Georges Niang, who led Iowa State with 24 points, for the rest of the tournament after he broke his foot.
